EmailTemplate.name: ASI CRM TW PAF (Final to Draft)
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: PAF status updated from 'Final' to 'Draft'
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ASI_HK_CRM_Pre_Approval_Form__c.OwnerFullName},
Your {!ASI_HK_CRM_Pre_Approval_Form__c.Name} is updated from 'Final' to 'Draft', please have a check! {!ASI_HK_CRM_Pre_Approval_Form__c.Link}
